sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AuthContext } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Dashboard = () => { const { currentUser, authFetch } = useContext(AuthContext); const [properties, setProperties] = useState([]); const [reports, setReports] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); // Mülkleri ve raporları yükle useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { // Mülkleri getir const propertiesResponse = await authFetch('http://localhost:8080/api/properties'); if (!propertiesResponse.ok) { throw new Error('Error loading properties'); } const propertiesData = await propertiesResponse.json(); setProperties(propertiesData); // Raporları getir const reportsResponse = await authFetch('http://localhost:8080/api/reports'); if (!reportsResponse.ok) { throw new Error('Error loading reports'); } const reportsData = await reportsResponse.json(); setReports(reportsData); } catch (err) { setError(err.message); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); }, [authFetch]); if (loading) { return (
Loading data...
); } return (
{/* Üst Başlık Alanı */}

Welcome, {currentUser?.name || 'User'}

Manage your properties and reports from here.

New Property {properties.length > 0 && ( New Report )}
{error && (

{error}

)} {/* Özetler */}

Sent
{/* Mülkler */}

Your Properties

Add New Property

You haven't added any properties yet

To use the deposit protection system, you need to add your rented property first.

Add First Property
) : (

{property.city}

{property.landlordName}
{property.landlordEmail || 'E-posta bilgisi yok'}
New Report {reports.filter(report => report.propertyId === property.id).length} Rapor
))}
)}
{/* Raporlar */}

Your Reports

{properties.length > 0 && ( Create New Report )}
{reports.length === 0 ? (

You haven't created any reports yet

Create a report to document the condition of your property and share it with your landlord.

{properties.length > 0 ? ( Create First Report ) : ( Add Property First )}
) : (

Property Report Date Status Actions

{property?.city || ''}

Sent: {new Date(report.reportSent).toLocaleString('en-US')}
)} 		{report.status === 'draft' ? 'Draft' : report.status === 'sent' ? 'Sent' : 'Viewed'} {report.status !== 'draft' && report.pdfUrl && (
View PDF
)} {report.reportViewed && (
{new Date(report.reportViewed).toLocaleString('tr-TR')}
)}
View {report.status === 'draft' && ( Add Photos )}
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
